insert into t_homepage_comment ( id, opus_id, parent_id, content, img_links, comment_owner, anonymous_flag, favorite_count, reply_count, comment_time, modify_time ) values ( null, #{opusId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{imgLinks}, #{commentOwner}, #{anonymousFlag}, #{favoriteCount}, #{replyCount}, #{commentTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.select: select distinct t1.*, if( t2.valid_flag = 0, 0, 1 ) as "isCurrentUserFavorite" from ( select thc.id as "id", tsu.avatar as "userAvatar", tsu.user_account as "username", thc.content as "commentContent", thc.comment_time as "commentTime", thc.favorite_count as "commentFavoriteCount" from t_homepage_comment thc left join t_sys_user tsu on thc.comment_owner = tsu.user_id and tsu.alive_flag = 0 where thc.parent_id = #{cid}) t1 left join t_homepage_favorite t2 on t1.id = t2.comment_id and t2.user_id = #{userId}

with recursive comment_tree as ( select id, opus_id, parent_id, content, img_links, comment_owner, anonymous_flag, favorite_count, reply_count, comment_time, modify_time from t_homepage_comment thc where id = #{scid} union all select thc2.id, thc2.opus_id, thc2.parent_id, thc2.content, thc2.img_links, thc2.comment_owner, thc2.anonymous_flag, thc2.favorite_count, thc2.reply_count, thc2.comment_time, thc2.modify_time from comment_tree ct join t_homepage_comment thc2 on ct.id = thc2.parent_id ) select ct.id as id, ct.opus_id as opusId, ct.parent_id as parentId, ct.content as content, ct.img_links as imgLinks, ct.comment_owner as commentOwner, ct.anonymous_flag as anonymousFlag, ct.favorite_count as favoriteCount, ct.reply_count as replyCount, ct.comment_time as commentTime, ct.modify_time as modifyTime, tsu.user_id as userId, tsu.user_name as userName, tsu.avatar as avatar, if( thf.valid_flag = 0, 0, 1 ) as isCurrentUserFavorite from comment_tree ct left join t_sys_user tsu on ct .comment_owner=tsu.user_id left join t_homepage_favorite thf on ct.id = thf.comment_id and thf.user_id = tsu.user_id order by comment_time desc
